Item.Value: Greetings, young one. I am $0$, purveyor of magic and enchantments. I hope you find your stay in town pleasant.
For me? Oh, $^$, you shouldn't have.
I hope you can help me. Some upstart goblins snuck into my house last night and stole my orb. It's very precious to me, and I want it back. If you get it for me, I'll make it worth your while.
Oh thank you! Here, take this!
